title: PlayStation Announcing Game Pass Competitor Next Week?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.25.22
description:
Blessing and Tam end the week talking about Project Spartacus rumors, GTA+, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:15 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Tik Tok continues to put out some bangers, today you can find a horrifying clip of Greg trying desperately to scan his face into WWE 2k22. That’s up right now on www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:18:25 - Sony’s could reveal Project Spartacus as soon as next week - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:35:11 - Ad
00:39:03 - GTA Online adds a Battle Pass
00:47:47 - Xbox has unveiled a new publishing division - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:53:40 - Bloodborne Kart is REAL
00:56:04 - Netflix Acquires Its Third Game Studio in Six Months - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:56:18 - Big changes are coming to Gran Turismo 7 - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
00:57:29 - Out today
00:59:10 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week's Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Snowbike Mike and Gary
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Bless
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
